101.comments: Special note: This course commences with a two-week pre-term module on Monday, August 24 that is required for some students, and on Friday, September 4 for students who are exempted from the module. For further information, including exemption requirements and the schedule and location of the module, please see CIVL 201 requirements http://www.civil.ubc.ca/academic-programs/undergraduate-program/civl-201-requirements .  For registration enquiries, please contact undergradsupport@civil.ubc.ca.Do NOT contact the professor regarding registration problems.

description: The design process; graphical, visualization and computational tools; civil engineering disciplines; decision-making; teamwork; conceptual design project reflecting community, economic, environmental, sustainability and technical considerations.
